column3: I need a break. I think I'll go away {{c1::for}} a few days.
I learnt a lot {{c1::during}} the course. The teachers were very good.
Mark used to live in Spain. He lived there {{c1::for}} five years.
Sarah was very angry with me. She didn't speak to me {{c1::for}} a week.
I don't have much free time {{c1::during}} the week, but I relax at weekends.
Many houses were damaged {{c1::during}} the storm.
We're good friends. We've known each other {{c1::for}} a long time.
It's impossible to find a hotel room here {{c1::during}} the festival.
Gary works at home, so he's usually at home {{c1::during}} the day.
I haven't been to the cinema {{c1::for}} years.
